title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Pomerantz Law Firm Announces the Filing of a Class Action Against Shoals Technologies Group, Inc. – SHLS
description: NEW YORK, April 08, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Pomerantz LLP announces that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Shoals Technologies Group, Inc. (“Shoals” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: SHLS). Such investors are advised to contact Danielle Peyton at newact…
